    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(NetworkInterface networkInterface)
        Adds the given interface to this route and returns true.
        Parameters:
        networkInterface -
        Returns:
        true (as specified by LinkedList.add(Object))
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the given interface is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given interface parent device is different from current route's last device (if any)

      • add

        public boolean add(Route route)
        Merges the given route with this route and returns true if the route has changed. The new route is added to the end of the current route.
        Parameters:
        route -
        Returns:
        true if the route changed as result of the call
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the given route is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the first device of the given route is different from current route's last device (if any)

      • prepend

        public boolean prepend(NetworkInterface networkInterface)
        Adds the given interface in the beginning of the current route and returns true.
        Parameters:
        networkInterface -
        Returns:
        true
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the given interface is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the parent device of the remote interface that is connected to the given interface is different from current route's first device (if any)

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of interfaces this route contains.
        Returns:
        the number of interfaces this route contains

      • registerListenerForRoutingUpdates

        public void registerListenerForRoutingUpdates(NotificationListener listener)
        Call this method to register a listener for NotificationCodes.RP_ROUTING_UPDATED notifications on each device in this route including the parent of the remote interface that is linked to the last interface in this route (ie: destination device).

        Prefer using this method rather than to iterate through network interfaces of this route.

        Parameters:
        listener -

      • getResourcePromise

        public NetworkResource getResourcePromise(NetworkOperation operation)
        Returns the resource promise for the given operation through this route (all interfaces).

        The returned promise can be safely granted as it is checked against all interfaces (links) that the route contains.

        Parameters:
        operation - the operation for whom a resource promise will be returned
        Returns:
        the resource promise for the given operation through this route

      • grantAllocatedResource

        public void grantAllocatedResource(NetworkOperation operation)
        Grants the operation allocated resource through this route.
        Parameters:
        operation - allocated resource of this operation is granted through the current route

      • revokeAllocatedResource

        public void revokeAllocatedResource(NetworkOperation operation)
        Revokes the operation allocated resource through this route.
        Parameters:
        operation - allocated resource of this operation is revoked through the current route

      • iterator

        public Iterator<NetworkInterface> iterator()
        An iterator over the interfaces of this route in proper order.

        The first interface is the interface of the source device.
        The last is the interface of the penultimate device and not the destination device. This last interface is linked to the destination device (use NetworkInterface.getRemoteNetworkInterface().getParent() to get the destination device.

        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<NetworkInterface>

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

        public static Route toRoute(NetworkInterface... networkInterfaces)
